title: Medium Access Control (MAC)
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Who gets to speak on a shared wire? 
- **Aloha**: Just shout. If collision, retry. (Bad).
- **CSMA/CD** (Ethernet): Listen before talk. If collision, stop and backoff.
- **CSMA/CA** (WiFi): Collision Avoidance (RTS/CTS).

interview_questions.question: Why CD doesn't work in WiFi?
interview_questions.answer: Radio is half-duplex. You can't listen while shouting (Transmitting signal drowns incoming).
